verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Seeing we are encompassed about
By so great a cloud of witnesses
On the left and the right
And we do not fight alone.
Chorus:
Onward then we've trod,
We are the Kingdom of God,
Born to brind down Babylon,
Born to bring a new age on.
We are His righteousness,
We are His righteousness,
We are His righteousness.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All creation travaileth
To see us be revealed,
To set them free from futility
God's sons have all been sealed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Having therefore this promise,
We lay aside ev'ry sin.
Cast off the weights
And contend for the faith,
And let us fight to win.
